properties.displayName: File In Suspicious Location Encoded To Base64 Via Certutil.EXE
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessCommandLine contains "-encode" or ProcessCommandLine contains "/encode") and (ProcessCommandLine contains "\\AppData\\Roaming\\" or ProcessCommandLine contains "\\Desktop\\" or ProcessCommandLine contains "\\Local\\Temp\\" or ProcessCommandLine contains "\\PerfLogs\\" or ProcessCommandLine contains "\\Users\\Public\\" or ProcessCommandLine contains "\\Windows\\Temp\\" or ProcessCommandLine contains "$Recycle.Bin") and (FolderPath endswith "\\certutil.exe" or ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "CertUtil.exe")

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects the execution of certutil with the "encode" flag to encode a file to base64 where the files are located in potentially suspicious locations
